channel.title: MSPK. Betst server ever 317
channel.description:
Hello. I want to advertise my RSPS
Server link [URL=http://"http://www.mspk.hostizzo.com"]http://www.mspk.hostizzo.com[/URL]
Here at MSPK we strive for our players to have fun, so we will make sure you do! forums coming soon. Unique features, short and to the point: - Perfect clan wars, clanchat integration - Perfect combat triangle, accuracy, maximum hits, curses and clipping, 'perfect' - Known because of our 'perfect' summoning, every known special and detail(orb options, summon pures) - Perfect Castle Wars with collapsing, mining and catapults. 'perfect' - Perfect agility linked with running system and resting, 'perfect' - Killstreak system, higher killstreak gets you higher pk points! - Perfect clipping system which supports npcs with a bigger size and has support for projectile checking in combat. - Stable without any lagg or disconnections at any playercount(Downtime: only when we are updating else 100% uptime) - Forum integrated, posts shown ingame - Outstanding economy which fulfills your needs - Skilling - Soul Wars - Blast Furnace Mini-Game - Castle Wars - Custom Pk Mini-Game - Christmas Mini-Game added (Not released in server yet) - Dungeoneering now better - Working on Client (~50% Done).
Some Screens:
[IMG]http://puu.sh/2kY5h.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2kYyF.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2kYzC.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2kYAx.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2kYCF.jpg[/img]

item.title: MSPK. Betst server ever 317
item.dc:creator: @Lirimoo Lirimoo
item.description:
@Lirimoo wrote:

[quote=“MDSPK, post:1, topic:509256”]Hello. I want to advertise my RSPS

Server link http://www.mdspk.hostizzo.com

Here at MDSPK we strive for our players to have fun, so we will make sure you do!
forums coming soon.
Unique features, short and to the point:

  • Perfect clan wars, clanchat integration
  • Perfect combat triangle, accuracy, maximum hits, curses and clipping, ‘perfect’
  • Known because of our ‘perfect’ summoning, every known special and detail(orb options, summon pures)
  • Perfect Castle Wars with collapsing, mining and catapults. ‘perfect’
  • Perfect agility linked with running system and resting, ‘perfect’
  • Killstreak system, higher killstreak gets you higher pk points!
  • Perfect clipping system which supports npcs with a bigger size and has support for projectile checking in combat.
  • Stable without any lagg or disconnections at any playercount(Downtime: only when we are updating else 100% uptime)
  • Forum integrated, posts shown ingame
  • Outstanding economy which fulfills your needs
  • Skilling
  • Soul Wars
  • Blast Furnace Mini-Game
  • Castle Wars
  • Custom Pk Mini-Game
  • Christmas Mini-Game added (Not released in server yet)
  • Dungeoneering now better
  • Working on Client (~50% Done).

Some Screens:





[/quote]

Read full topic
